description.text: Air bubblecreates a small pocket of breathable air that surrounds the touched creature's head or the touched object. The air bubble allows the creature touched to breathe underwater or in similar airless environments, or protects the object touched from water damage.

sections.Components: S, M/DF (a small bladder filled with air)
sections.Targets: one creature or one object no larger than a Large two-handed weapon
